amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit waivers on applicable conflicts of interest rules to members of vaccine-related Federal advisory committees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 68 printed in the Congressional Record to add provisions prohibiting any scientist, physician or other individual who is a member, or prospective member, of a federal advisory committee that has responsibilities regarding vaccines from being granted a waiver from the conflict-of-interest rules that apply to such service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 253 (Roll no. 384).
